summary: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried provided more information on the current state of FTX but didn't explain what went wrong.
title: FTX US had enough to repay all customers, Bankman-Fried tweets
content:
Former FTX CEO Sam Bankank-Fried returned to his ongoing, mysterious Twitter thread with the following:<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
a) Alameda had more assets than liabilities M2M (but not liquid!)<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
b) Alameda had margin position on FTX Intl<br data-v-f87c67ca="">
c) FTX US had enough to repay all customers
Not everyone necessarily agrees with this
Disclaimer: The former CEO and majority shareholder of The Block has disclosed a series of loans from former FTX and Alameda founder Sam Bankman-Fried.
